article_title: Everything Jim Cramer said about the stock market on ‘Mad Money,’ including earnings overload, CSX ...
article_text: CNBC’s Jim Cramer says the onslaught of earnings reports this week has brought Wall Street to the point of “maximum disorientation” and reminds investors how to balance the workload. The “Mad Money” host gives a read on railroad company CSX coming off its latest quarterly report in an interview with CEO Jim Foote. He chats with ServiceNow CEO John Donahoe, who is departing the company next year for Nike, to find out how the global economy is affecting business spending on digital transformation.
